header.title: We are Rexys
header.title_content: Rexys is a canadian company that specializes in the design, control, and manufacturing of autonomous systems.

welcome.title_content: We're ready to help you innovate and transform your business or projects, using the latest technologies, from strategy development through implementation.

box2.title: Embedded Systems
box2.content: Our solutions include Tegra-, ARM- and FPGA-based embedded systems

box3.title: Machine vision
box3.content: Navigation and localization using machine vision.
